champ_0030_rival_02:
Just had to tell you—my Pokémon are learning
some pretty cool new moves! Be ready![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0030_rival_03: How’d it go at the Gym, by the way?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0030_rival_04a:
Yesss! Hah haaa! I mean, it was obvious you were
gonna pass, but congrats![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0030_rival_04b:
Pfft! Sure, you big joker! I bet you walked out
with a badge, didn’t you?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0030_rival_05:
I’m so glad I encouraged you to take on the
Gyms. Nice job, past me![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0030_rival_06:
I’m training hard too, by the way—day and night!
Going all over the place to boot!\c
Thank goodness we’ve got the map app. It helps
a ton with figuring out where to go next—\r
especially in a huge place like Paldea!\c
After all, the path to getting stronger usually has
some strange stops and detours!\c
Hm. Speaking of going strange places, I wonder
what Arven’s up to...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0030_rival_07:
Anyway, catch you later! I hope you know I’m
gonna want a battle if we run into each other![VAR 0114(0004)]
